TopicTitle: After exiting KSP, it won’t run again unless I restart my computer

Articles.Content:
The program runs fine the first time. I play, I save, I exit. Then, if I come back to it later and run the .exe file, it goes through the starting process right up until the bar completes, then goes to a smaller window that says something about Unity, then all closes out like I’d never run the program. If I restart the computer, it runs fine on the next try. This happens almost every time.

KSP version 1.12.1.3142
